original_text: Then Jehu called all the people to come together. He said to them, ‘Ahab served Baal, but he did not do it very well. But I, Jehu, will serve Baal much better!
korean_text: 예후가 뭇 백성을 모으고 그들에게 이르되 아합은 바알을 조금 섬겼으나 예후는 많이 섬기리라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehu called all the people
but he did not do it very well
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그것을 아주 잘하지는 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: But I, Jehu, will serve Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나, 여호야는 바알을 섬길 것입니다
